title: Fallen Heroes remembered at Birmingham Buddhist Maha Vihara
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix By: Birmingham Buddhist Maha Vihara Media Unit) A special religious ceremony was organised by the Sri Lankan community in the Midlands at the Birmingham Buddhist Maha Vihara, Hockley, Birmingham in memory of the valiant heroes of the Sri Lanka Armed Forces who had sacrificed their valuable lives for…
